title: Texas police-shooting victim featured in Reuters qualified immunity series dies
description: David Collie, a Fort Worth, Texas, man whose bid to hold police liable for shooting him in the back and leaving him paralyzed was blocked by the legal doctrine known as qualified immunity, has died at age 38.
content: NEW YORK, Feb 25 (Reuters) - David Collie, a Fort Worth, Texas, man whose bid to hold police liable for shooting him in the back and leaving him paralyzed was blocked by the legal doctrine known as qâ€¦ [+3350 chars]
